# Metagenomik pratik




Figüre 1 oluşturmak için:

```bash
Rscript workflow/scripts/Figure-1.R --profile Data/microbial-profile.txt --metadata Data/microbial-metadata.txt --out Results/BetaDiversity/Figure-1.pdf

```
Figure 2 oluşturmak için

```bash
Rscript workflow/scripts/Figure-S1.R --profile Data/microbial-profile.txt --metadata Data/microbial-metadata.txt --out Results/BetaDiversity/Figure-S1.pdf
```
